# SCRIPT NAME: Build and Deploy Sproutify Classrooms

# WHEN TO RUN:
# Run automatically every time code is pushed to the 'main' branch.
on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main

# WHAT TO DO:
jobs:
  run-the-script:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    # Make the Supabase secrets available to the build command
    env:
      VITE_SUPABASE_URL: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_URL }}
      VITE_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY: ${{ secrets.SUPABASE_ANON_KEY }}

    steps:
      # Step 1: Get the new code
      - name: Get latest code from GitHub
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      # Step 2: Set up the programming environment (Node.js)
      - name: Setup Node.js environment
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'
          cache: 'npm'

      # Step 3: Install all the project tools
      - name: Install dependencies
        run: npm ci

      # Step 4: Run the build command (compile TypeScript to JavaScript)
      - name: Build the website
        run: npm run build

      # Step 5: Upload the finished website to IONOS
      - name: Deploy to server
        uses: appleboy/scp-action@v0.1.4
        with:
          host: ${{ secrets.IONOS_HOST }}
          username: ${{ secrets.IONOS_USERNAME }}
          password: ${{ secrets.IONOS_PASSWORD }}
          source: "./dist/*"
          target: ${{ secrets.IONOS_SCHOOL_PATH }} # <-- THIS IS THE UPDATED LINE
          strip_components: 1
